events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's description.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle this refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund faster.
My order number is 4578219. Attached is the photo showing the incorrect item I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
Your refund has been successfully processed. We apologize again for the inconvenience and hope to serve you better next time.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
